metadata.title: CVE-2023-50431 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: sec_attest_info in drivers/accel/habanalabs/common/habanalabs_ioctl.c inthe Linux kernel through 6.6.5 allows an information leak to user spacebecause info->pad0 is not initialized.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
